Text:
Thank you so much Nepotu.  I wish there were more people like you out there (especially people who upload English language versions of UCL games!)

Oh yeah, and thank you for the UCL games, I still watch them even though I don't know Russian, Ukranian, German or Spanish.  I'm slowly learning how to say corner kick in Russian though!

:) You're funny, drew. Well, the russians are more helpful. If I would had a generous upload bandwidth I would upload much more english versions of La Liga, UCL, ECL etc. But with max. 80 kB/sec what can I do? You're welcome, bro!
PS: If you can find though a radio mp3 commentary, you can put in sync with the video an you haven't to learn russian :)
With all of these versions you so courteously upload, I don't suppose you would be interested in doing a PS3 friendly non-MKV, perhaps AVI version? :)
